FOUND IN: It is located in Gwynedd and forms part of the Snowdon massif within Snowdonia National Park

The term itself originates from the Old French 'flor de lut,' which means 'flower of the lily.' It's made up of three petals and two stamen and is often associated with purity due to its resemblance to a blooming flower.

CLUE: Thin mortar for filling building joints etc
